species.name: Chiss
species.description: Near-humans with dark-blue skin and glowing red eyes, the Chiss tend ot run to the tall side of the human body type. Their skin color and eyes grow more intense the greater concentration of oxygen they are in. On average, Chiss tend to be more physically fit and overall more attractive than regular humans, assuming one is not thrown off by the skin and eyes. Their hair is universally jet black, save for the silvering found in those of advanced age.
species.specialAbilities: Can see in both infrared and visual spectrums: remove up to 1 Setback added to checks by lighting conditions.
